data.description:
Welcome to "Brick Smash VR," the ultimate brick-breaking experience in VR!

A classic brick-breaking game with a twist, and it’s easy to play.

This game combines traditional stages with irregular shapes and a variety of in-game items for even more exciting gameplay.

Key Features:

⭐ Immersive VR: Experience lifelike brick-breaking and precise paddle controls, immersing you in a unique adventure.

⭐ Diverse Skills: Unlock abilities like Fireball, Enlarge Paddle, Speed Up Ball, and Split Ball, each offering unique challenges.

⭐ Variety of Bricks: Encounter bricks with distinct characteristics, from Iron Bricks to Teleportation Points, adding depth to the game.

⭐ Challenging Levels: Tackle meticulously designed levels, from simple to advanced, refining your skills along the way.

⭐ Stunning Backgrounds & Music: Enjoy ten Skybox 360-degree backgrounds and 100 immersive tracks, enhancing your experience.

⭐ Global Leaderboard: Compete for top rankings with faster completion times.

⭐ Passthrough Mode: Seamlessly switch between virtual and real-world environments for enhanced spatial awareness.

⭐ Optimized Performance: Enjoy smooth gameplay and sharper visuals with increased resolution.

Dive into the ultimate gaming experience now!

changelog.change_log:
-Increase the default game resolution to make the visuals sharper and clearer.\n
-Expand the game’s music library from 10 tracks to 100, providing a unique audio and visual experience each time you play.
